thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Conditions In Tender Offer For Sare Shares Fulfilled

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Conditions In Tender Offer For Sare Shares Fulfilled
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Polinvest 7 S.a.r.l, Tomasz Pruszczynski:
* SAY THAT 916,892 SARE SHARES HAD BEEN SUBSCRIBED FOR IN THE COURSE OF A TENDER OFFER
* THUS, THE TENDER CONDITION HAS BEEN FULFILLED * TOMASZ PRUSZCZYNSKI AND POLINVEST 7 ANNOUNCED TENDER OFFER FOR 1.7 MILLION OF SARE SHARES IN DEC. 2017
Source text: bit.ly/2BMSvb8
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
